ai-patthana15.49:0.2_0: Living in the teaching, they are included in the discourses and found, as it’s amazing.
ai-patthana15.49:1.1_0: Incorproviding the mind, the skillful is not a condition for the unskillful.
ai-patthana15.49:1.1_1: Examination is not skilled in the exterior.
ai-patthana15.49:1.1_2: One who is skilled in the seven exterior sense fields and skilled in the seven exterior sense fields. He doesn’t give rise to causes.
ai-patthana15.49:1.1_3: ‘... for the sake of the three realms.’ ...
ai-patthana15.49:2.1_0: Indible One is not skilled in the seven unskillful phenomena. There is a cause or condition for the arising of thought.
ai-patthana15.49:2.1_1: The exterior sense fields don’t give rise to the thought element. The causes and conditions are not the reason for.
ai-patthana15.49:2.1_2: One who is skilled in the seven exterior sense fields and unskillful phenomena don’t give rise to diversity.
ai-patthana15.49:2.1_3: ‘... for the sake of the three realms.’ ...
ai-patthana15.49:2.1_5: (This should be expanded as for the three roots of the following.)
